moTa: The Lamborghini Aventador is available as a convertible and coupe. It gets EPA-estimated 12-13 MPG combined. The Lamborghini Aventador competes against models like the McLaren 570S, Aston Martin V12 Vantage S, and Aston Martin Vanquish. The Aventador is a good fit for sun lovers Sun Lover vehicles have convertible tops or removable roofs. The Lamborghini Aventador S is available as a convertible and coupe. The 2018 Aventador S starts at $417,650 (MSRP), with a destination charge of $3,495. It gets EPA-estimated 12 MPG combined. The Lamborghini Aventador S competes against models like the McLaren 570S, Acura NSX, and Aston Martin DB11.

The Lamborghini Huracan is available as a convertible and coupe. The 2018 Huracan starts at $199,800 (MSRP), with a destination charge of $3,495. It gets EPA-estimated 15-16 MPG combined. The Lamborghini Huracan competes against models like the Rolls-Royce Wraith, Acura NSX, and Ferrari 488 GTB. The Huracan is a good fit for sun lovers Sun Lover vehicles have convertible tops or removable roofs.
